name: part_001
file: tmp_【#雪花ラミィ3周年LIVE】ラミィの『大好き』詰め合わせ！Lamy＊Love♡Fest☆【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [215Bq5oo9Bw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Yukihana Lamy performing 'Our Bright Parade' to conclude the first segment of the concert.
Instrumental transition and stage change as Lamy prepares for the next performance.
Yukihana Lamy performing a cover of 'Idol' by YOASOBI.
MC section where Lamy introduces herself to the audience.

subtitles.original: 風、夢、羽根、輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, feathers, they're shining!

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも
subtitles.english: Both frustration and affection

subtitles.original: 連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring them along

subtitles.original: 風、夢、羽根、飛び立つのさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, feathers, we're taking flight!

subtitles.original: さあさあ舞い踊れ光、終わりなき予兆
subtitles.english: Now, now, dance in the light, an endless omen

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んでいく、素敵なスタートさ
subtitles.english: Diving in with you, it's a wonderful start!

subtitles.original: ここから、これから、Our Bright Parade!
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade!

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: The media is disrupted by your invincible smile

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: Everyone wants to know your secrets, so mysterious

subtitles.original: 抜けてるとこさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even your clumsy side is part of your domain

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: You are perfect and a liar

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: A genius idol

subtitles.original:
アイドル
作詞・作曲：Ayase
subtitles.english:
Idol
Lyrics/Composition: Ayase

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today? What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: If you were to go out, where would you go?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない、それは内緒
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything, that's a secret

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: No matter what I'm asked, I dodge the questions

subtitles.original: 淡々と、だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: Calmly, yet brilliantly

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: Secrets that are almost visible yet hidden taste like honey

subtitles.original: あれもないないない、これもないないない
subtitles.english: Not that, not this, nothing at all

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？相手は？さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Who's the lucky one? Come on, answer me!

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: "I don't really understand what it means to fall in love with someone."

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない、そんな言葉にまた一人堕ちる
subtitles.english: Not knowing if it's a lie or the truth, another person falls for those words

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Making them fall in love again

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone is captivated by you

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: You are the perfect and ultimate idol

subtitles.original: 金輪際現れない、一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: A once-in-a-lifetime occurrence, the reincarnation of the first star

subtitles.original: その笑顔で愛してるで、誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: With that smile and "I love you," you captivate everyone

subtitles.original: その瞳がその言葉が、嘘でもそれは完全なアイ
subtitles.english: Even if your eyes and those words are lies, it's a perfect love

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, that girl is special

subtitles.original: 我々はハナからおまけです
subtitles.english: We were just extras from the start

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: Just a supporting cast B to make the star shine

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のお陰なわけない
subtitles.english: Not everything is thanks to her

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い、妬み嫉妬なんてないわけがない
subtitles.english: How annoying, there's no way we don't feel envy or jealousy

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃないからこそ許せない
subtitles.english: This isn't a joke, which makes it unforgivable

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive you if you're not perfect

subtitles.original: 自分を許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive myself

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I won't acknowledge anyone but you, who is stronger than anyone

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じ崇めてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes in and worships you

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: Truly the strongest and invincible idol

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない、一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: No weaknesses to be found, carrying the first star within you

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: Don't you dare show any weaknesses

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Without showing the parts people don't want to see

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ、それこそ本物のアイ
subtitles.english: You must be one of a kind, that's what true love is

subtitles.original: 得意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Inciting the media with your signature smile

subtitles.original: 隠しきるこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: Keeping only this secret hidden

subtitles.original: 愛してるって嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: Building a career on "I love you" lies

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛だ
subtitles.english: This is my own way of showing love

subtitles.original: 流れる汗も綺麗なアクア
subtitles.english: Even the trickling sweat is beautiful aqua

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: These eyelids that hide the rubies

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: Singing and dancing, I am Mary

subtitles.original: そう、嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are the ultimate form of love

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも、誰かのこと愛したこともない
subtitles.english: Never been loved by anyone, nor have I ever loved anyone

subtitles.original: そんな私の嘘がいつか、本当になること
subtitles.english: That lie of mine will one day become the truth

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: One day I'll surely have it all

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: I'm such a greedy idol

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのこと、ちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to love everyone for who I really am

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの
subtitles.english: I'll keep lying today

subtitles.original: この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: Hoping that these words will one day become the truth

subtitles.original: それでもまだ君と君にだけは言えずにいたけど
subtitles.english: Even so, there's still something I couldn't say to you and only you

subtitles.original: ああ、やっと言えた、これは絶対嘘じゃない
subtitles.english: Ah, I finally said it, and this is definitely not a lie

subtitles.original: 愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: 愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: はい！ということで始まりました！皆さんこんらみー！
subtitles.english: All right! And so it begins! Hello everyone, Kon-Lamy!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ5期生の、高潔、肝臓、雪花ラミィです！
subtitles.english: I'm the noble liver of Hololive's 5th generation, Yukihana Lamy!

subtitles.original: ラミィちゃんしか！勝たん！
subtitles.english: Lamy-chan is the best!
